mapper.select: select lm.subj_cd,subj_name,comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,comm_cd_func('targetGrade',target_grade) as target_grade, credit,max_stu_num,lec_hour,materials,comm_cd_func('geCd',ge_cd) as ge_cd,mid_ratio,final_ratio,assign_ratio,attend_ratio, comm_cd_func('evalClassCd',eval_class_cd) as eval_class_cd,lec_date_1,lec_date_2,outline from lec_manage lm, syllabus sy, marks_std ms where lm.subj_cd=sy.subj_cd and ms.syl_cd=sy.syl_cd and sy.syl_cd=#{slyCd}
